name: General penalty
text:
(a)  Any person violating this chapter or any rule adopted thereunder for which a penalty is not otherwise provided, shall be guilty of a petty misdemeanor and, in addition to any other penalties, shall be fined not less than:



	(1)	$250 for a first offense;
	(2)	$500 for a second offense; and
	(3)	$1,000 for a third or subsequent offense.



	(b)  The fines specified in this section shall not be suspended or waived. [L 1985, c 94, pt of §1; am L 1999, c 195, §3]
